quote: Fastest way to stop the flow is to put your hand on the faucet.
author: Luke Cage

quote: If I could gift wrap the globe, I'll give you the world.
author: Jermaine Cole

quote: Eyes on the prize, yep, I'm tryna stay focused.
author: Markeyvius Cathey

quote: Gotta do better than last year, that's my motto.
author: Dominique Jones

quote: We live in branded houses trademarked by corporations built on bipolar numbers jumping up and down on digital displays, hypnotizing us into the biggest slumber mankind has ever seen. You have to dig pretty deep, kiddo, before finding anything real.
author: Mr. Robot

quote: Nothing humbles a man like gravity.
author: Luke Cage

quote: Control is an illusion. But sometimes you need the illusion to get by.
author: Mr. Robot

quote: They told me you had true grit, and that is why I came to you.
author: Charles Portis - True Grit (1968)

quote: The more you sweat in training, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Military adage

quote: The more you sweat in training, the less you bleed in battle.
author: Military adage

quote: You lost your heart. It was the best part of you.
author: Luke Cage
